span.p: All K-12 Pennsylvania schools are closed for the year.
All School and District offices are closed.
Please email (click link) administrators directly with questions.

li.a: Application and Information for Free and Reduced Lunches

li.span: for the Teams Quick Reference Guide.
Technical Assistance for District Computers & Hotspots, email:

p.span: The District will provide one Hotspot per household for students that do not have internet access.
To sign up to receive a hotspot, email the following information to

li.span: Preferred email and phone number (required for pickup).

p.span: Orders may also be called into 824-4111, supplying the required informaiton.

span.p:
For comments or suggestions on this website,
contact us at: [email protected]
